Summarize

Let‚Äôs load the libraries.

# libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(nycflights13)
library(fivethirtyeight)
library(juanr)

Class: trade

IGOS in 1960:

trade |>
  filter(year == 1960) |>
  summarise(med_igos = median(sum_igos))
# A tibble: 1 √ó 1
  med_igos
     <dbl>
1       33

IGOS in 1960:

trade |>
  filter(year == 2010) |>
  summarise(med_igos = median(sum_igos))
# A tibble: 1 √ó 1
  med_igos
     <dbl>
1       66

At least one sea border:

trade |>
  filter(year == 2010, sea_borders >= 1) |>
  summarise(mean_exports = mean(exports, na.rm = TRUE))
# A tibble: 1 √ó 1
  mean_exports
         <dbl>
1      105389.

No sea border:

trade |>
  filter(year == 2010, sea_borders >= 1) |>
  summarise(mean_exports = mean(exports, na.rm = TRUE))
# A tibble: 1 √ó 1
  mean_exports
         <dbl>
1      105389.

Most exports:

trade |>
  filter(year == 2012) |>
  filter(exports == max(exports, na.rm = TRUE))
# A tibble: 1 √ó 10
  country  year  imports  exports     gdp         pop land_borders sea_borders
  <chr>   <dbl>    <dbl>    <dbl>   <dbl>       <dbl>        <dbl>       <dbl>
1 China    2012 2331123. 2494240. 1.79e13 1310926531.           14           4
# ‚Ñπ 2 more variables: min_cap_dist <dbl>, sum_igos <dbl>
